DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether DMTS , compare placebo patch , provide adequate pain relief first 3 day follow bunionectomy surgery .
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study evaluate analgesic efficacy DMTS , compare placebo subject acute moderate severe pain follow unilateral bunionectomy . The secondary objective : - To assess safety tolerability DMTS , include assessment skin irritation - To assess adhesion DMTS - To assess sedation effect DMTS
